resources.string: Highly Motivated and Passionate Engineer with experience in developing efficient Android Application and seeking for an opportunity to apply my skills and knowledge in building innovative mobile applications. Eager to contribute to a dynamic team, gain practical experience, and further develop my expertise in developing user-friendly and powerful applications. My academic background, coupled with internships and projects, has equipped me with valuable knowledge in the field of Technology. I am a quick learner, detail-oriented impending engineer and going to complete my graduation in 2024 with a dream to explore IT world with a new ideas and values.

It is a simple and elegant app that allows users to write, save, and share their favorite quotes. You can also explore a vast collection of quotes from different categories and also download various images. You can add widgets to your home screen with your favorite quotes. Inspirational quotes at your fingertips. It helps to increase productivity. This app is built using Android Studio IDE, Kotlin for the backend, Retrofit for API calls, Firebase for data storage and authentication, and XML for layout design. Lottie animations are used to add delightful animations to the user interface. I created and published this project on the Google Play Store to enhance my Android development skills and gain real-world experience in app deployment. This hands-on experience has deepened my understanding of Android app development and its practical aspects, enriching my knowledge and skills in the field

It is a comprehensive application that calculates daily calorie requirements, suggests customized workouts based on user\'s fitness level and gender and provides BMI information. Designed to promote health, wellness, enhancing user\'s fitness journey. This app is built using Android Studio IDE, Java for the backend, Retrofit for API calls, Local Storage for data storage and authentication, and XML for layout design.

This is my first project using flutter.I made this to explore the world of flutter.The "BMI Calculator App using Flutter" is a mobile application designed to help users calculate their Body Mass Index (BMI) quickly and easily. BMI is a measure of body fat based on an individual\'s weight and height. This app empowers users to monitor and understand their BMI, offering insights into their overall health status.

This application revolutionizes the way kids visualize and learn things. Utilizing AR, the app displays animated animals, plants ,birds ,etc. with their respective sound and category. which will help kids to visualize the nature in their surrouding. This app is built using Android Studio IDE, Kotlin for the backend, Firebase for data storage and authentication, and XML for layout design. Google ARCORE for AR implementation.

This application is an online platform used to build and develop relation between peoples and modified the way people communicate. This website permit users to upload pics, upload multimedia content material or alternate the profile and sound of profiles , weblog posts , comments and sharing contact listing.Users can choose who can view, edit and add to their friend list ,and so on ,to preserve their privacy on social media platform. It provides ways to Users to interact online with people with similar interests for social purposes Like, Dislike , Online comments ,digital photographs post submissions are all possible.
